fields.description: Revenue Recognition Schedule Reference ID. This is the unique Revenue Recognition Schedule identifier.
Submit flag.  The service will attempt to submit the schedule if this is on.
Generate Installments flag. The service will generate revenue recognition installments if this is set to true. You cannot generate installments if using a Custom schedule distribution method.
Reference element representing the schedule status.

Automatically Regenerate Installments flag.  Use this flag to automatically regenerate installments when Customer Contract Amendments are completed.

Automatically Submit Schedule via Contract Amendment flag. Use this flag to automatically submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule on Customer Contract Amendment completion after installments are automatically regenerated.
Generate Cumulative Catch Up Installments flag

Schedule Override Rate. Specify if Schedule Override Rate is specified in Default Currency Rate.
Revenue Recognition Schedule Alternate Ledger Currency Rate Override Data
Reference element representing instances Invoice Lines linked to this schedule.
Revenue Recognition Installment Data

This element contains data to be used with the Defined Installment or 'RECURRING' schedule distribution method. For each contract line included in the schedule, you can specify a Regular, First, and Last Installment amount that will be used when generating installments to determine how to allocate amounts across each installment.
Multi Period Allocation Data for Revenue Recognition Schedule.
One of more references to Customer Contract Lines. The operation will return current Revenue Recognition Schedules for the lines provided.. Supports multiple values.
One of more references to Customer Contract Lines. The operation will return current Revenue Recognition Schedules for the lines provided.. Supports multiple values.
